member.summary: Gets or sets the redirect URI (required).

member.summary: Gets or sets the state length.

member.summary: Gets or sets the browser implementation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for browser invisible mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets the clock skew for validating identity tokens.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RefreshDiscoveryDocumentForLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discovery document is re-loaded for every login/prepare login request
member.value: true if discovery document needs to be re-loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RefreshDiscoveryOnSignatureFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discovery document gets re-loaded when token validation fails due to signing key problems
member.value: true if discovery get re-loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.LoadProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether claims are loaded from the userinfo endpoint
member.value: true for loading claims from userinfo; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.FilterClaims
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to filter claims.
member.value: true if claims are filtered; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RefreshTokenInnerHttpHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner HTTP handler used with RefreshTokenHandler.

member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP handler used for back-channel communication (token and userinfo endpoint).

member.summary: Gets or sets the backchannel timeout.

member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP client factory.

member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication style used by the token client (defaults to posting clientid/secret values).

member.summary: Gets or sets the policy.

member.name: T:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy
member.summary: The validation policy for OidcClient

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.Discovery
member.summary: Gets or sets the policy for discovery.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireAccessTokenHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether at_hash is required (defaults to false).
member.value: true if at_hash is required; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireIdentityTokenOnRefreshTokenResponse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an identity token is required on refresh token responses (defaults to false).
member.value: true if [require identity token on refresh token response]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireIdentityTokenSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an identity token must be signed or not (unsigned identity tokens are only allowed in authorization code flow)
member.value: true if identity token must be signed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.ValidateTokenIssuerName
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the identity token issuer name should match.
member.value: true if identity token issuer name should match; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets the supported identity token signing algorithms.

member.summary: Sends an HTTP request to the inner handler to send to the server as an asynchronous operation.

A cancellation token to cancel operation.
member.returns: Returns . The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally disposes of the managed resources.
